title: Ludovic: a crocodile in my garden
creator_credit: Co Hoedeman, Jean-Jacques Leduc, Therese Descary, Animation Youth Studies, French Program and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Ludovic, a young teddy bear organises his origami jungle animals to go on a spring picnic in his garden. The mood degenerates as the animals disobey Ludovic and fight one another. Ludovic retreats inside disappointed, but all is resolved happily when cookies are distributed and the animals learn to share.
